name: BLINKSPACE PERISCOPE

actions.name: Pierce the Veil
actions.detail: You thrust a probe through blinkspace to any realspace point within n. Until the end of the scene, you have line of sight, but not line of effect, to any space within m of that point. The action fails and the limited use is wasted if this point would be inside a character, object, or other obstruction.

description:

name: PHASED ARRAY NANOGRAVITY DETECTOR
effect: Characters and objects do not benefit from invisibility against you.
description: Data from a phased array of nanogravity detectors are fused with other sensors to detect things that are otherwise cloaked.

name: PARACAUSAL WINGS
effect: You fly or something? I can't remember.
description: They're made of stone, but you can fly. I dunno, the boys in the lab are just as confused as we are. Maybe don't think about it too much.
